overview: An archive preserves fragments of toppled statues. In a corner, a fan rocks the atmosphere. The air caresses the gestures of the workers. The hum of the engine and the long wait induce sleep:  In a dream, military and civilians smile inertly.  (Distant shots, whistles of bullets and explosions).  In another dream, there are only stones, indifference and oblivion.  (None of the above is real or true).
title: Eyes / Eyes / Eyes / Eyes
